price: ߢߊߘߐߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߟߏ߫ ߣߌߡߊ߫ ߟߐ߬ߣߍ߲ߒߖߘߍ߬ߟߊ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߮ ߕߊ߬ߓߊ߮ ߓߘߊ߫ ߖߋ߰ߘߐ߬ߞߏߟߏ߲ߧߊ߫ ߞߟߋ߫
arabic: ۞ وَعَنَتِ ٱلۡوُجُوهُ لِلۡحَيِّ ٱلۡقَيُّومِۖ وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَنۡ حَمَلَ ظُلۡمٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waʿanati al-wujūhu lil'ḥayyi al-qayūmi waqad khāba man ḥamala ẓul'man
